content: Join the Next Evolution of Gambling with in-house, poker and multiple games to chose!Key Highlights:First Deposit Bonus upto 400%,Get upto $20,000Daily Wager Contest, win from ¬†$800 just for being the top wagerer of the dayParticipate in Jack‚Äôs Jackpot worth $80,000 and countingDay of Death (Monthly Contest) every month with $7500 as prize poolRegular rains, Rakeback, Reload Bonus, and ton of VIP rewardsüíµ Low House Edge üèÜ Daily ContestsClick here to join the Evolution with thousands of members!  https://jacksclub.io/?t=dcWould be really interested in hearing your reviews.[/list]

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: If this one: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5246554.0 isn't locked yet, then why open a new thread? Just a suggestion to close the former thread instead if you want it brand-new or close this one and continue on the past thread. Anyways, glad you're getting back into the scene, welcome back again in the forum.

comments.author: JacksClub
comments.body: Sure thing, Thanks for the welcome! I have locked the earlier topic as of now!Quote from: rhomelmabini on November 11, 2023, 01:26:01 PMIf this one: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5246554.0 isn't locked yet, then why open a new thread? comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: @OP, Are you a new person behind the Jacksclub representative account? I have noticed worried posting quality from your account recently. You had recently created two altcoins giveaway thread, both of them have been deleted by the moderators. Moreover, you are trying to attract users by posting in some other gambling discussions related thread.Anyway, the old ANN thread of Jacksclub is better than this new ANN thread. I'm wondering why you have created this new thread for Jacksclub and locked the better one.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Your other locked thread has a better announcement than this one, why create a new one to replace a new one are you relaunching the casino or do you want a fresh start, I thought it was a newly launched casino until I saw your other thread.I'm sure you know how things work here so better to create a more well-designed announcement or post images on the best feature of your casino since you already have a Copper account.I don't remember you launching a campaign here maybe this is the right time, I checked your feedback and there's a tag that the site is managed by Rollbit's old team, will this association harm or benefit the platform?

comments.author: panjul07
comments.created_time: November 11, 2023, 02:09:33 PMLast edit: November 11, 2023, 02:28:21 PM by panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on November 11, 2023, 01:46:02 PMYour other locked thread has a better announcement than this one, why create a new one to replace a new one are you relaunching the casino or do you want a fresh start, I thought it was a newly launched casino until I saw your other thread.I'm sure you know how things work here so better to create a more well-designed announcement or post images on the best feature of your casino since you already have a Copper account.I'm not quite sure why they need to create a new ANN thread to be honest, but it seems the jacksclub.io account has just moved to other person. The link provided in this new thread is different compared to the old one. Quote from: coin-investor on November 11, 2023, 01:46:02 PMI don't remember you launching a campaign here maybe this is the right time, I checked your feedback and there's a tag that the site is managed by Rollbit's old team, will this association harm or benefit the platform?They had signature campaign 2 years ago but it was for several weeks only IIRC. Correction (bold) jacksclub is managed by ex Rollin team not Rollbit, these are 2 different casinos. Rollin was a popular dice site in the past, can be said as one of the early dice sites in the crypto industry.

Everyone knew you are old casino here except for newbie. Rollin was a popular dice site in the past, can be said as one of the early dice sites in the crypto industry. Thank you for correcting me bro if there is a change of account then they have to state this, its not often that a casino create another announcement when the old announcement is doing good, I checked the scam section for any reports and there is none and they do have good reviews from casino review sites so its a good start from Jacksclub.io.As long as there are no valid accusation they can relaunch their casino but they have to make sure that they are better than their last campaign.I think its better for them to launch another signature campaign, so they can regain their old players here that left the platform I'm sure they are familiar on this platform, and to gain new users also.

I think it's fair. 400% bonus for first deposit and up to $20K, that's a lot and the catch would also be staggering. Anyway, Welcome back to bitcointalk.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: JacksClub on November 11, 2023, 01:26:52 PMSure thing, Thanks for the welcome! I have locked the earlier topic as of now!You locked the old thread but I suggest you to do two more mini things by adding information and link to a new thread (this one) at a first post and the last post (you should create it after that one) as your team announcement to move to a new thread.Quote from: panjul07 on November 11, 2023, 02:09:33 PMThey had signature campaign 2 years ago but it was for several weeks only IIRC.That campaign lasts for 7 weeksQuoteCorrection (bold) jacksclub is managed by ex Rollin team not Rollbit, these are 2 different casinos. They confirmed that their team engaged in Jacksclub.io business.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: It's very strange that you closed an ann thread and created another ann thread that is ugly when in the ann you created the beauty it has is clearly visible. It looks like we are not dealing with the same person, that in itself is scary because it could also be that the casino no longer belongs to the same person, I looked at the post history of this account and I see last year in August it was made the last post of the year 2022 and the person behind this account only posted again in May of this year, that is, he did not enter this forum for 9 months and when he entered this forum in May of this year he made only 1 post and then disappearedHe only posted again this month, on November 6th, that is, he spent June, July, August, September, October of this year without making any posts on this forum. and suddenly he posts again on November 6th and posts constantly and creates a new thread with no quality, he doesn't explain why he left the old thread, he doesn't explain why he disappeared for many months. Honestly, this is all very strange. A casino is a very responsible business, people are putting their money into the casino, so the minimum a casino owner needs to have is to respect their customers, pay attention to their customers.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: JacksClub on November 11, 2023, 01:26:52 PMSure thing, Thanks for the welcome! I have locked the earlier topic as of now!I'm not really sure why you decided to make a whole new thread instead of just adding to an existing one - that usually helps build up your rep 'round here. ¬†but hey, no biggie. But, you might wanna go back and spice up your first post a little to make it stand out more than all the other casino sites people talk about on this forum so it grabs people's attention more. I'd throw in some pictures or graphics or something if it were me.Quote from: tranthidung on November 11, 2023, 03:52:22 PMThe account of Rollin.io team was still actively last month. They confirmed that their team engaged in Jacksclub.io business.I believe Rollin' was way more popping back in its heyday than any of these newfangled dice sites that have been sprouting up lately. ¬†Real shame they had to go and shut the site down.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: If you're going to do a relaunch it's important that you have a better version of your announcement, based on all our comparisons the old thread is better than this one, they just posted a text-based announcement, which makes you inferior to all the other announcements and your own old announcement, if this is a new representative its common practice to check the works of the old representative.This is a bad relaunch OP also failed to mention their old announcement for reference, this is standard practice here so people will know about your status if you're an old or a new player here, it seems like the new representative has a lot of work to do.

comments.author: JacksClub
comments.body: Quote from: JacksClub on November 11, 2023, 01:20:54 PMJoin the Next Evolution of Gambling with in-house, poker and multiple games to chose!Key Highlights:First Deposit Bonus upto 400%,Get upto $20,000Daily Wager Contest, win from ¬†$800 just for being the top wagerer of the dayParticipate in Jack‚Äôs Jackpot worth $80,000 and countingDay of Death (Monthly Contest) every month with $7500 as prize poolRegular rains, Rakeback, Reload Bonus, and ton of VIP rewardsFairly New and Low Competition! [/list]Click here to join the Evolution with thousands of members!  https://jacksclub.io/?t=dcWould be really interested in hearing your reviews.Thank you so much for the valuable feedback from everyone!I'm thrilled to announce that I've recently joined JacksClub as the new community manager. I'm on a learning journey about Bitcoin talk, and your insights have been incredibly helpful. I initiated a fresh thread to revitalize our discussions, and your warm reception has not gone unnoticed. Rest assured, I am fully committed to addressing concerns and making improvements based on your suggestions.While the core business remains unchanged, my focus is on cultivating a positive community atmosphere. I aspire to provide casino players with fair opportunities through engaging contests and relevant discussions, hence the inclusion of altcoin posts. Regarding this ANN post, I acknowledge the need for enhancement, and I am eager to implement the suggested improvements from the community.To clarify, there's no shift in the business model; I'm simply a new addition to the team, navigating through the intricacies of the Bitcointalk forum. Your support is paramount as we work together to elevate our understanding and experience on this platform.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: JacksClub on November 11, 2023, 05:37:23 PMI'm thrilled to announce that I've recently joined JacksClub as the new community manager. I'm on a learning journey about Bitcoin talk, and your insights have been incredibly helpful. Well, that's why you made a little mistake in your main post. You have used an unnecessary 'list' command on your post. Hopefully you will learn everything properly as the time goes on.Quote from: JacksClub on November 11, 2023, 05:37:23 PMI aspire to provide casino players with fair opportunities through engaging contests and relevant discussions, hence the inclusion of altcoin posts.But it was against the rules of the forum. Altcoins giveaway isn't allowed here. As a casino operator, you should run the giveaway in Bitcoin on this forum, and the giveaway thread must need to be in the 'Games and rounds' board. The system of the giveaway needs to be standard as well for the transparency. You may follow other casinos or services giveaway thread to get some idea.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Is there KYC on the site? I would be interested to have a chat about poker with you and possibly a sponsored tourney series. I'll send a pm shortly to see about your interest in such a series.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Welcome to the forum and I hope you'll get some good players for your site from here. I recommend you to launch a signature campaign in order to get proper exposure, and additionally you can also launch a review campaign to get some feedback about your platform. The proper marketing is needed to have new players on your platform and this forum is the best place for such marketing. Your site looks good and I believe it will offer some good services to the members of the forum and surely it's always better to have a announcement thread with proper graphics. The in-house poker sounds great to me, and if international players are allowed to play the poker then that would be a nice thing I guess.

comments.author: Russlenat
comments.body: Quote from: JacksClub on November 11, 2023, 01:20:54 PMWould be really interested in hearing your reviews.Maybe consider a review campaign for your site, especially since there might not be many reviews from the community yet, given that the gambling site isn't widely known. It could be a fresh start for promoting the site. Additionally, you might want to think about running a signature campaign, but be sure to choose a reputable campaign manager to ensure you get the expected results.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Have the site got new owners? I mean why did you guys thought of creating a new ANN thread? We have already seen the previous announcement thread, and it was good to be honest. So why there is need of a new ANN thread and that too with poor designs compared to the previous version. If you can maintain transparency OP, then definitely people will support with you. Let‚Äôs see what new features the site is offering now.
